name: Jion
description: Jion is believed to be named after the Jion-ji, a Buddhist temple in China. The actual translation of Jion means 'Love and Goodness.' Although the kata's creator is unknown, credit is usually given to Sokon Matsumura, who is presumed to have learned this kata during his travels to China. Jion is the simplest of the Sentei kata and is comprised mostly of pieces from Heian and Tekki kata. It has 47 counts and contains some of the most basic movements that Shotokan has to offer. Being a simple kata, there are no fancy moves to hide behind. The idea when performing the kata is to be like a Buddha, with a strong yet humble spirit. The simplicity of its movements demonstrates one's humility, yet each technique should be performed with explosive power and unwavering stability.

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs

subMoves.hiragana: じあい の かまえ
subMoves.description: In heisoku-dachi position. Place your hands in front of you, at chin level, right fist closed in the left hand. The elbows are bent, and in contact with the bust. Position called 'Posture of benevolence'

moves.japaneseName: 右中段内腕受け/左下段払い

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうけ / ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Move your left foot down to the zenkutsu-dachi position, while performing a mid-level right inner-outer block (uchi-uke) and a left descending block (gedan-barai)

subMoves.hiragana: ちゅうだん かきわけうけ
subMoves.description: Advance the left foot at 45° in the zenkutsu-dachi position, bring your elbows against the chest by spreading your fists to make a medium ascending separator block (kakiwake-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ まえげり けあげ
subMoves.description: Without changing the position of the arms, send a right frontal kick (mae-geri)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Land the right foot in the same axis in the zenkutsu-dachi position, while performing a middle right elongated right fist (chūdan zuki)

moves.sequenceName: Hidari chūdan gyaku-zuki / Migi chūdan zuki
moves.japaneseName: 左中段逆突き/右中段突き

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん ぎゃくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: On the spot, always in zenkutsu-dachi position, chain a left inverted left hand punch (gyaku-zuki)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん づき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: and a direct straight right hand punch (chudan-zuki)

subMoves.hiragana: ちゅうだん かきわけうけ
subMoves.description: Turn the head to the right, turn 90° to the right to find yourself in the zenkutsu-dachi position, while bringing the elbows against the chest and spreading the fists to perform an ascending separator block middle level (kakiwake-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり まえげり
subMoves.description: Without changing the position of the arms, send a left frontal kick (mae-geri)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.description: Rest the left foot in the same axis in the zenkutsu-dachi position, while performing a middle left elongated forehand (oi-zuki)

moves.sequenceName: Migi chūdan gyaku-zuki / Hidari chūdan zuki
moves.japaneseName: 右中段逆突き/左中段突き

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ぎゃくづき
subMoves.description: On the spot, still in zenkutsu-dachi position, string a right-hand inverted right punch (gyaku-zuki)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん づき
subMoves.description: and a direct left-handed punch middle level (chudan-zuki)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり じょうだん あげうけ
subMoves.description: Move the left foot at 45° to find yourself in the center of kata position zenkutsu-dachi, while performing an upward lock left high (age-uke), right in hikite fist

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ぎゃくづき
subMoves.description: On site, still in position zenkutsu-dachi, chain inverted blow right average (gyaku-zuki)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん あげうけ
subMoves.description: Move your right foot in the axis of the kata. Place the right foot in the zenkutsu-dachi position, while performing a right upward (age-uke) up-lock, the left fist in hikite

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん ぎゃくづき
subMoves.description: On the spot, always in zenkutsu-dachi position, chain a left inverted left hand punch (gyaku-zuki)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり じょうだん あげうけ
subMoves.description: Advance the left foot in the axis of the kata. Put the left foot in the zenkutsu-dachi position, while doing a high level left-up blocking (age-uke), the right fist in hikite

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.description: Move your right foot along the kata axis to find yourself in the zenkutsu-dachi position, while performing a right middle level right punch (oi-zuki) - KIAI!

subMoves.hiragana: まんじうけ
subMoves.description: Rotate 270° to the left on the right foot, facing to the right to find yourself in the zenkutsu-dachi position. Perform a high-level indoor-outdoor blockage (uchi-uke) in your back, and send the left arm forward to perform a low-level left lock (gedan-barai). You are blocking up/down (manji-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん かぎづき
subMoves.description: By pushing on the right foot, slide slightly to the left in kiba-dachi position. At the same time, lower the right fist in front of you to make a medium-level crooked punch (kagi-zuki)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり じょうだん うちうけ / みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Transfer the center of gravity of your body to your left foot to move to zenkutsu-dachi position in the other direction. Perform a high level indoor-outdoor blockage (uchi-uke) in your back, and send the right arm forward to perform a low level right lock (gedan-barai). You are blocking up/down (manji-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん かぎづき
subMoves.description: While pushing on the left foot, slide slightly to the right in kiba-dachi position. At the same time, lower the left fist in front of you to make a medium-level crooked punch (kagi-zuki)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Advance the left foot in zenkutsu-dachi position, at the same time as you make a left descending block (gedan-barai)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ていしょううち
subMoves.description: Advance the right foot and complete the advance to find yourself in the kiba-dachi position. Simultaneously, wear a heel strike with the middle right hand (teisho-uchi)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん ていしょううち
subMoves.description: Advance the left foot and complete the advance to find yourself in the kiba-dachi position. Simultaneously, wear a heel strike with your left hand (teisho-uchi)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ていしょううち
subMoves.description: Advance the right foot and complete the advance to find yourself in the kiba-dachi position. Simultaneously, wear a heel strike with the middle right hand (teisho-uchi)

subMoves.hiragana: まんじうけ
subMoves.description: Swivel 90° to the left on the right foot to find yourself in the kokutsu-dachi position. Perform a high-level indoor-outdoor blockage (uchi-uke) in your back, and send the left arm forward to perform a low-level left lock (gedan-barai). You are blocking up/down (manji-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: じょうだん もろてうけ
subMoves.description: Still in kokutsu-dachi position, push on the right foot and stick it against the left foot in heisoku-dachi position. Simultaneously, make a left high-level blocking (morote-uke) to the left

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり じょうだん うちうけ / みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Turn the head to the right, shift right foot to the right to find yourself in kokutsu-dachi position. Forcefully pull the left arm back to make a high-level inside-outside block (uchi-uke) in your back, and send the right arm to perform a low-level left block (gedan-barai). You are blocking up/down (manji-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: じょうだん もろてうけ
subMoves.description: Still in kokutsu-dachi position, push on the left foot and stick it against the right foot in heisoku-dachi position. At the same time, make a right high level lock (morote-uke) to the right

moves.japaneseName: 両腕下段掻き分け受け

subMoves.hiragana: りょうわん げだん かきわけうけ
subMoves.description: On the spot, still in heisoku-dachi position, raise the right arm up left without moving the left, to sweep the space in front of you. Lower the 2 arms on both sides of the body to perform a double descending separator jam (ryowan kakiwake-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: げだん じゅうじうけ
subMoves.description: Powerfully lift your right knee by pulling your elbows backwards. Push on the left foot to propel you forward and lower the pelvis in kosa-dachi position, while performing a cross-lock down, right fist on the left fist (juji-uke)

moves.japaneseName: 両腕下段掻き分け受け

subMoves.hiragana: りょうわん げだん かきわけうけ
subMoves.description: Push on the right foot and powerfully extend the left leg behind you in zenkutsu-dachi position. Simultaneously, send the fists on either side of the cops to perform a double descendant separator block (ryowan kakiwake-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: りょうわん うちうけ
subMoves.description: Advance on the left foot to find yourself in zenkutsu-dachi position. Simultaneously, perform a double-level interior-exterior blocking (ryowan uchi-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: じょうだん じゅうじうけ
subMoves.description: Without changing the position of the arms, move the right foot to the zenkutsu-dachi position, while performing a cross-up blocking, left-side arm (juji-uke)

moves.japaneseName: 右裏突き/左上段上げ受け

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ うらづき / ひだり じょうだん あげうけ
subMoves.description: Always in zenkutsu-dachi position, turn the pelvis to the left, send the right arm forward to bring a close punch (ura-zuki), and at the same time, bring your left arm back towards your face to prevent an age-uke

moves.sequenceName: Migi jōdan nagashi-uke / Migi jōdan ura-zuki
moves.japaneseName: 右上段流し受け/右上段裏突き

subMoves.technique: Migi jōdan nagashi-uke / Migi jōdan ura-zuki
subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん ながしうけ / みぎ じょうだん うらづき
subMoves.description: Still in zenkutsu-dachi position, pivot the pelvis to the right, pull the right elbow behind the right shoulder to perform a high-level swept block (nagashi-uke) all extending your left arm in front of you. Send the right fist forward for a close high-level (ura-zuki) punch

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.description: With the left foot, go around the body to the left to rotate 270° to find yourself in the zenkutsu-dachi position, while performing a middle-left blocking middle level (uchi-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.description: Advance the right foot to find yourself in zenkutsu-dachi position, while performing a middle right elongated right punch (oi-zuki)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.description: Turn the head to the right, step back the right foot, turn the pelvis 180° to the right to find yourself in zenkutsu-dachi position, while performing a right inside-outside blocking level medium (uchi-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.description: Advance left foot to find yourself in zenkutsu-dachi position, while performing a middle left elongated forehand (oi-zuki)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Turn your head to the left, shifting your left foot to the left. Rotate the body on the right foot 90° to the left to find yourself in the zenkutsu-dachi position, while performing a left descending block (gedan-barai)

moves.japaneseName: 踏み込み蹴り/右落とし受け

subMoves.hiragana: ふみこみげり / みぎ おとしうけ
subMoves.description: Without changing the position of the left arm, powerfully cast the right leg up in front of you while raising the right fist above the head. Take a crushed kick right in front of you (fumikomi-geri) to find yourself in the kiba-dachi position. Execute a crashed blocking of the right fist on the right (otoshi-uke)

moves.japaneseName: 踏み込み蹴り/左落とし受け

subMoves.hiragana: ふみこみげり / ひだり おとしうけ
subMoves.description: Powerfully cast the left leg up and to the right to scan the space in front of you while raising the left fist above the head. Take a crushed left kick in front of you (fumikomi-geri) to find yourself in the kiba-dachi position. Execute a crashed blocking of the left fist on the left (otoshi-uke)

moves.japaneseName: 踏み込み蹴り/右落とし受け

subMoves.hiragana: ふみこみげり / みぎ おとしうけ
subMoves.description: Powerfully cast the right leg up and to the left to scan the space in front of you while raising the right fist above the head. Take a crushed kick right in front of you (fumikomi-geri) to find yourself in the kiba-dachi position. Execute a crashed blocking of the right fist on the right (otoshi-uke)

moves.japaneseName: 上段掴み受け/左弓突き

subMoves.hiragana: じょうだん つかみうけ / ひだり ゆみづき
subMoves.description: Swivel the pelvis 90 degrees to the left and bring the left foot towards you. Shift left foot to the left to find yourself in the kiba-dachi position. Close the right fist and pull the right elbow backwards while you punch the left bow (yumi-zuki)

moves.japaneseName: 上段掴み受け/右弓突き

subMoves.hiragana: じょうだん つかみうけ / みぎ ゆみづき
subMoves.description: Turn the head to the right. Push on the left foot to slide the right foot to the right, keep the kiba-dachi position. Simultaneously, punch the bow (yumi-zuki) to the right by pulling the left elbow in the opposite direction - KIAI!

subMoves.hiragana: やめ
subMoves.description: Bring the right foot against the left foot in heisoku-dachi position. Place your hands in front of you, at chin level, right fist closed in the left hand
